author: @ogaetbabybeel1025
text:
Another wonderful work on this new IVE album "Empathy" 😱🔥😍!! 

We feel all the members' involvement, everyone brings something, a lot of work and the songs are really magnificent and some speak to me more than others 😊. 
We don't say it enough, but congratulations to the teams behind it, whether it's makeup, dance, the person behind the camera... Without you, there wouldn't be as much magic. 

Thank you from the bottom of my heart for your hard work everyone, and thank you for having "IVE" one of the best groups and for me (this is my personal opinion), IVE can sit at the table of Blackpink, Stray Kids and say: I'm one of the big groups 🔥. For me, it's not just a question of Fans, I see above all, all the work that is done behind it, the marketing etc... 

Sorry for this long message, but sometimes you have to know how to thank everyone, because we forget that too often 🙏🏻
